text: Acıbadem Üniversitesi Spor Kulübü, is a Turkish professional basketball club based in Istanbul which plays Turkish Basketball League (TBL). Their home arena is Acıbadem Üniversitesi Sports Hall with a capacity of 500 seats. The team was founded by Acıbadem University in 2014. == External links == * Acıbadem Üniversitesi Spor Kulübü, Official website * Acıbadem Üniversitesi, TBF Profile Category:Basketball teams in Turkey Category:Basketball teams established in 2014 Category:Sport in Istanbul Category:2014 establishments in Turkey
title: Acıbadem Üniversitesi S.K.
